snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include a Fast Company analysis of why women leave technology companies, and a new affliction for people who spend the day hunched over their electronic devices: iPosture.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include a Fast Company analysis of why women leave technology companies, and a new affliction for people who spend the day hunched over their electronic devices: iPosture.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Why Women Leave Tech, and a Guide to Twitter's I.P.O. Filing
